f825ecaf-6283-4b45-9d18-386782b278b7.name: Wedge Antilles
f825ecaf-6283-4b45-9d18-386782b278b7.text: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

34653fe9-0627-460d-8d9a-4fdad8c990a4.name: Garven Dreis
34653fe9-0627-460d-8d9a-4fdad8c990a4.text: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

bc62a4b5-f88f-4873-aac4-5d13b0808141.name: Biggs Darklighter
bc62a4b5-f88f-4873-aac4-5d13b0808141.text: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

fc36479e-f495-4abc-98e0-0b1e6ebea2a3.name: Luke Skywalker
fc36479e-f495-4abc-98e0-0b1e6ebea2a3.text: When defending, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

4f6b65e4-3076-4793-b8b6-655ca37f482e.name: "Dutch" Vander
4f6b65e4-3076-4793-b8b6-655ca37f482e.text: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2.  The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

a5700b9b-ad4b-42d9-8099-0c693020125e.name: Horton Salm
a5700b9b-ad4b-42d9-8099-0c693020125e.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

e0a201cf-5249-47c0-838e-2eec174d3275.name: "Winged Gundark"
e0a201cf-5249-47c0-838e-2eec174d3275.text: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

d3decc87-0740-4928-91b0-36bb971fe2f4.name: "Night Beast"
d3decc87-0740-4928-91b0-36bb971fe2f4.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

8948d4ab-03e2-4b2b-a58c-a4b2abca4c38.name: "Backstabber"
8948d4ab-03e2-4b2b-a58c-a4b2abca4c38.text: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

319f9b9a-6c4d-4da1-99db-6890ed186abc.name: "Dark Curse"
319f9b9a-6c4d-4da1-99db-6890ed186abc.text: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

cd046df2-2556-454a-a227-4db14aac0a9e.name: "Mauler Mithel"
cd046df2-2556-454a-a227-4db14aac0a9e.text: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

d96039d9-312a-4949-bb14-9a0480c8e488.name: "Howlrunner"
d96039d9-312a-4949-bb14-9a0480c8e488.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

3148ac1b-339d-4756-a452-aedff17d001b.name: Maarek Stele
3148ac1b-339d-4756-a452-aedff17d001b.text: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

c7dff4b7-791d-4ba1-9da4-e57f45ffcb25.name: Darth Vader
c7dff4b7-791d-4ba1-9da4-e57f45ffcb25.text: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

70d2e8fe-81a8-4411-9e23-1786dcda9934.name: "Fel's Wrath"
70d2e8fe-81a8-4411-9e23-1786dcda9934.text: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

53985c82-80a5-46f7-ad37-1e18116962ba.name: Turr Phennir
53985c82-80a5-46f7-ad37-1e18116962ba.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

3dc7dbd3-4943-4236-9519-c42ad259969f.name: Soontir Fel
3dc7dbd3-4943-4236-9519-c42ad259969f.text: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

6c05c21d-f72b-4141-9efb-adf05a12ac3e.name: Tycho Celchu
6c05c21d-f72b-4141-9efb-adf05a12ac3e.text: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

b6b447b6-0089-40d3-b096-32eab835e1d5.name: Arvel Crynyd
b6b447b6-0089-40d3-b096-32eab835e1d5.text: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

fee2c709-3c41-4ff7-a801-18dbb5522bf1.name: Chewbacca
fee2c709-3c41-4ff7-a801-18dbb5522bf1.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

2cbd618b-b385-4ff9-a1f1-7b99f4c14f8a.name: Lando Calrissian
2cbd618b-b385-4ff9-a1f1-7b99f4c14f8a.text: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

1955ba7b-aa64-4a9e-bb19-49ca7cf6b910.name: Han Solo
1955ba7b-aa64-4a9e-bb19-49ca7cf6b910.text: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice.  If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

5fe780dd-01e1-4972-ad5b-4bde22833f27.name: Kath Scarlet
5fe780dd-01e1-4972-ad5b-4bde22833f27.text: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 result.

cd1cda95-0e6a-4b48-bd6f-7333987acd77.name: Boba Fett
cd1cda95-0e6a-4b48-bd6f-7333987acd77.text: When you reveal a bank maneuver ( or ), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

8407054e-4c9a-4c14-a90d-8dda1be715f0.name: Krassis Trelix
8407054e-4c9a-4c14-a90d-8dda1be715f0.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

12e34989-104d-4651-a71b-6df8f8722273.name: Ten Numb
12e34989-104d-4651-a71b-6df8f8722273.text: When attacking, 1 of your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

51b72653-1301-402b-b488-af12ef1d70a9.name: Ibtisam
51b72653-1301-402b-b488-af12ef1d70a9.text: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

057abc89-7b0b-4076-882a-57c702de20ca.name: Roark Garnet
057abc89-7b0b-4076-882a-57c702de20ca.text: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

ab46b4ad-5fa9-4ff5-940f-9de47f1df46e.name: Kyle Katarn
ab46b4ad-5fa9-4ff5-940f-9de47f1df46e.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

059232f6-b0c4-4145-8efe-e62531b7a239.name: Jan Ors
059232f6-b0c4-4145-8efe-e62531b7a239.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

87a138bb-95b4-42b7-bb3c-0590114af027.name: Captain Jonus
87a138bb-95b4-42b7-bb3c-0590114af027.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

f31218da-739f-4a56-9b20-c9fec5033361.name: Major Rhymer
f31218da-739f-4a56-9b20-c9fec5033361.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

566e5d40-66a3-4749-93a3-e9fcf7eebb87.name: Captain Kagi
566e5d40-66a3-4749-93a3-e9fcf7eebb87.text: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

4c4f5f91-f9cc-4793-9c4e-ffcddc8bd7ef.name: Colonel Jendon
4c4f5f91-f9cc-4793-9c4e-ffcddc8bd7ef.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

b849e6ba-5d0b-45de-bb22-01b71c7548dc.name: Captain Yorr
b849e6ba-5d0b-45de-bb22-01b71c7548dc.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

cd627d75-6800-4f41-a4e2-61db3e1b2719.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
cd627d75-6800-4f41-a4e2-61db3e1b2719.text: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ( 1) or ( 1) template instead of the ( 1) template.

98e6e7fa-9f95-434c-8b50-285e2a735eda.name: Tetran Cowall
98e6e7fa-9f95-434c-8b50-285e2a735eda.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

8509dee9-84f8-406c-8233-352d82cc32f2.name: Kir Kanos
8509dee9-84f8-406c-8233-352d82cc32f2.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 result to your roll.

601e8caf-bde8-439b-a7d6-a5e8c87de514.name: Carnor Jax
601e8caf-bde8-439b-a7d6-a5e8c87de514.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

a3eca5b5-e31c-43d8-980e-182fa48c69bc.name: Lieutenant Blount
a3eca5b5-e31c-43d8-980e-182fa48c69bc.text: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

7ff7ea8f-6c42-42a2-a989-127b09c60bcd.name: Airen Cracken
7ff7ea8f-6c42-42a2-a989-127b09c60bcd.text: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.

be96f6be-4a37-44d0-a3a2-a297cb69a09c.name: Colonel Vessery
be96f6be-4a37-44d0-a3a2-a297cb69a09c.text: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

ddefe7e2-52ed-4236-b0fd-36a64fad9203.name: Rexler Brath
ddefe7e2-52ed-4236-b0fd-36a64fad9203.text: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

6e9c2d81-8a4d-4674-98c5-8a9c55d1b5b6.name: Etahn A'baht
6e9c2d81-8a4d-4674-98c5-8a9c55d1b5b6.text: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its results to a result.

771b3a99-e5a9-4b57-ab8e-c4a7b9f9c705.name: Corran Horn
771b3a99-e5a9-4b57-ab8e-c4a7b9f9c705.text: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack.  You cannot attack during the next round.

3fc0d03d-4bbb-4843-b56e-e44b646d4110.name: "Echo"
3fc0d03d-4bbb-4843-b56e-e44b646d4110.text: When you decloak, you must use the ( 2) or ( 2) template instead of the ( 2) template.

2f5cca44-fc7c-421b-9c37-00533dbb8c7a.name: "Whisper"
2f5cca44-fc7c-421b-9c37-00533dbb8c7a.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

3f3b305a-7626-4b9e-9247-a056d4aac75e.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
3f3b305a-7626-4b9e-9247-a056d4aac75e.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

95e95eff-f8b3-460b-bbd4-8a94f8bb6191.name: Wes Janson
95e95eff-f8b3-460b-bbd4-8a94f8bb6191.text: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

94102b26-bd76-448b-9f0c-f8d172faf47d.name: Jek Porkins
94102b26-bd76-448b-9f0c-f8d172faf47d.text: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

04e0ff9f-eaae-4d7b-98dc-397ac3421941.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
04e0ff9f-eaae-4d7b-98dc-397ac3421941.text: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

478e8dbb-c870-433d-8a12-fe4df95f6910.name: Tarn Mison
478e8dbb-c870-433d-8a12-fe4df95f6910.text: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

7277886c-e553-4bdc-8e7c-7d01510bbc78.name: Jake Farrell
7277886c-e553-4bdc-8e7c-7d01510bbc78.text: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

587aa6e3-7ab4-4f6d-8deb-a86b231e3481.name: Gemmer Sojan
587aa6e3-7ab4-4f6d-8deb-a86b231e3481.text: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

f390b87e-ab34-4e2f-a71b-53ec757fc29d.name: Keyan Farlander
f390b87e-ab34-4e2f-a71b-53ec757fc29d.text: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your results to results.

ba2666d6-30ca-42b2-8803-29d9d66457d9.name: Nera Dantels
ba2666d6-30ca-42b2-8803-29d9d66457d9.text: You can perform secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

0dfa3340-1c02-4ab4-8a2a-e071cb132078.name: Eaden Vrill
0dfa3340-1c02-4ab4-8a2a-e071cb132078.text: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

4266e083-3c1c-4e39-8b8e-63f3b09c81bd.name: "Leebo"
4266e083-3c1c-4e39-8b8e-63f3b09c81bd.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

7494bdd8-f77b-43bf-8d1c-01ac4317c2a8.name: Dash Rendar
7494bdd8-f77b-43bf-8d1c-01ac4317c2a8.text: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

fea0491d-1020-489d-a181-52acdfb2e334.name: Captain Oicunn
fea0491d-1020-489d-a181-52acdfb2e334.text: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

72160f2f-a9b9-4e0c-ba42-cd44458124f0.name: Commander Kenkirk
72160f2f-a9b9-4e0c-ba42-cd44458124f0.text: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

15fbd20c-8814-475c-ab79-ba8378084699.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
15fbd20c-8814-475c-ab79-ba8378084699.text: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

b63d40a2-6db4-4c64-8473-b954eb064185.name: Prince Xizor
b63d40a2-6db4-4c64-8473-b954eb064185.text: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled or result instead of you.

8d47409c-bcac-4719-b8c1-985ca83bad44.name: Guri
8d47409c-bcac-4719-b8c1-985ca83bad44.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

64779b1a-a8c7-494b-81a7-b469499a5e0e.name: Serissu
64779b1a-a8c7-494b-81a7-b469499a5e0e.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

4ab617a1-62bb-486e-8662-a2282afe4172.name: Laetin A'shera
4ab617a1-62bb-486e-8662-a2282afe4172.text: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

f3aad912-49f3-425d-9f39-c35934810732.name: IG-88A
f3aad912-49f3-425d-9f39-c35934810732.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

b15eaefe-7baf-40cf-9d5e-e22aa29b9827.name: IG-88B
b15eaefe-7baf-40cf-9d5e-e22aa29b9827.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

f52a8d34-48c6-470f-83eb-beebd4d24d09.name: IG-88C
f52a8d34-48c6-470f-83eb-beebd4d24d09.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

f23de822-30ff-4094-a1cd-3bcefc76c2aa.name: IG-88D
f23de822-30ff-4094-a1cd-3bcefc76c2aa.text: You may execute the ( 3) or ( 3) maneuver using the corresponding ( 3) or ( 3) template.

5b0102bb-7201-4e99-86b8-c262c60f4564.name: N'Dru Suhlak
5b0102bb-7201-4e99-86b8-c262c60f4564.text: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

4d40ae3c-7bb8-435b-b8fe-eed68861cc8b.name: Kaa'To Leeachos
4d40ae3c-7bb8-435b-b8fe-eed68861cc8b.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

3f66ff9f-d969-486c-aeb3-041813cebe53.name: Boba Fett (Scum)
3f66ff9f-d969-486c-aeb3-041813cebe53.text: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

269bb073-d576-49bd-a2e4-aa3fba431f7a.name: Kath Scarlet (Scum)
269bb073-d576-49bd-a2e4-aa3fba431f7a.text: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

67e87ff0-7368-4b7b-840a-59dbd0b010ee.name: Emon Azzameen
67e87ff0-7368-4b7b-840a-59dbd0b010ee.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [ 3], [ 3], or [ 3] template instead of the [ 1] template.

ffe75e54-6a9f-4a39-9885-9052058b8948.name: Kavil
ffe75e54-6a9f-4a39-9885-9052058b8948.text: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

4520ee91-b95a-4761-9558-b7a1ca237f22.name: Drea Renthal
4520ee91-b95a-4761-9558-b7a1ca237f22.text: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

b32077c2-c54b-4ac6-bff6-127c949a0e38.name: Dace Bonearm
b32077c2-c54b-4ac6-bff6-127c949a0e38.text: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

9c31e641-2f70-47d1-838f-c6bfc3b183ce.name: Palob Godalhi
9c31e641-2f70-47d1-838f-c6bfc3b183ce.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

cbe91bca-8978-4f4a-9304-c9f9ca9f0479.name: Torkil Mux
cbe91bca-8978-4f4a-9304-c9f9ca9f0479.text: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

46df38ce-bcf5-4ff0-8e08-fe565db867ab.name: Commander Alozen
46df38ce-bcf5-4ff0-8e08-fe565db867ab.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.
